pr_title: Add OpenAPI yaml spec for Load endpoint

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #44 from TeamCtrlC/load-schema

Add load endpoint (cluster load) yaml schema.

timeline.bodyText: can we add a minimum and default field for this parameter? (see partitionLoad.yaml)
timeline.author: kidkun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+LoadEndpoint:
+  get:
+    operationId: load
+    summary: Get the cluster load once Cruise Control Load Monitor is running.
+    parameters:
+      - name: start
+        in: query
+        description: Start time of the cluster load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64

timeline.bodyText: can we add a minimum field for this parameter? (see partitionLoad.yaml)
timeline.author: kidkun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+LoadEndpoint:
+  get:
+    operationId: load
+    summary: Get the cluster load once Cruise Control Load Monitor is running.
+    parameters:
+      - name: start
+        in: query
+        description: Start time of the cluster load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64
+          # Default is time of earliest valid window.
+      - name: end
+        in: query
+        description: End time of the cluster load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64

timeline.bodyText: can we add a minimum and default field for this parameter?
timeline.author: kidkun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,64 @@
+LoadEndpoint:
+  get:
+    operationId: load
+    summary: Get the cluster load once Cruise Control Load Monitor is running.
+    parameters:
+      - name: start
+        in: query
+        description: Start time of the cluster load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64
+          # Default is time of earliest valid window.
+      - name: end
+        in: query
+        description: End time of the cluster load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64
+          # Default is current system time.
+      - name: time
+        in: query
+        description: End time of the clutser load.
+        schema:
+          type: long
+          format: int64

replies.bodyText:
I added minimum for this parameter as per the comment. However, default for this field is the current time stamp at time of execution (which is difficult to express as a constant value). I omitted adding the field in the yaml.
Let me know if you have a strong preference for default here and I will investigate a way to add it in.
replies.author: annaleeli
